description: This is a shell script designed to automate the setup, dependency installation, and server startup process in a continuous integration environment for a frontend application. It installs dependencies, manages different startup modes (static, ultralowmem, react), performs health checks, and handles graceful termination.

methods.name: start_static
methods.description: Starts a static server by executing the static-server.js script and returns its process ID.

methods.name: start_react
methods.description: Starts the React development server with specified environment variables and returns its process ID.

methods.name: graceful_exit
methods.description: Handles termination signals to gracefully shut down the started server process.
